document_data.name: White Dragon lodge
document_data.mainbody: The '''White Dragon berserker lodge''', also known as the '''Ice Dragon berserker lodge''', <ref group="note">While it is not explicitly stated, "white dragon" and "ice dragon" appear to be different names for the same berserker lodge. was perhaps the most prominent [[Rashemaar berserkers|berserker]] lodges in all of [[Rashemen]] as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Every so often, the White Dragon berserkers would go out on great hunts to slay their [[white dragon|namesake]] [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Base of Operations: The White Dragons had the largest lodge-house in the city of [[Thasunta]], and one of the largest within the town of [[Taporan]].
document_data.Possessions:
Upon their entrance into the lodge, White Dragon berserkers were given a spiked [[club|war club]] known as a ''[[dragon's fang]]''. 

The strongest of the lodge's [[ranger]]s were given a type of [[axe]] called a ''[[chill axe]]''.
document_data.Notable Members: The lodge's leader, [[Ygvarri|Ygvarri the Dark]], was regarded as the most famous of the Rashemaar berserkers.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The creature referred to as the ''ice dragon'' was said to guard a hidden treasure found at the bottom of Rashemen's [[Lake Tirulag]].
